title: 820-3662 no backlight
message:
Hello Everybody

Working on 820-3662 backlight problem. no liquid damage ..

PPBUS_SW_BLK 0V 
PPBUS_SW_LCDBKLT_PWR 12.5V
LCDBKLT_EN_L 12.5V
PPBUS_S0_LCDBKLT to ground resistance is 5.4 Mega ohm
BKLT_EN_R 3.3V

Also replaced , J8300,Q7706,L7710,D7701,Q7701,U7701,U7750

Tested known good LCD, I can hear chime and see dark screen. Any idea for next step?

title: 820-3662 no backlight
message: Did you check it with the correct LCD? 2012,13,14 will work on these for testing. SMC_LID high?

title: 820-3662 no backlight
message: Yes [USER="2"]dukefawks[/USER] checked LCD its for 2012/13 and backlight is working also  another mac. SMC_LID is 3.3V

title: 820-3662 no backlight
message: Diode mode on SMBUS_PCH_DATA and CLK?

title: 820-3662 no backlight
message:
SMBUS_PCH_DATA is 499Ohm ( Red probe ground at diode mode )
SMBUS_PCH_CLK is 500Ohm ( Red probe ground at diode mode )
same value is LCD connected and disconnected.

Voltage is 3.3V both line when machine running .

title: 820-3662 no backlight
message: Voltages on all pins of U7701. I can hardy believe this problem "just" happened. What is the history?

message:

Owner said suddenly stopped but some one worked on this place:(

title: 820-3662 no backlight
message:
If pin 6 has 5V what should be on pin 8? Although this is for KB bklt, there is something not right with that. I doubt this will cause issues with LCD bklt. 

Pins 15 and 16 are i2c bus, check for data on this bus with O-scope.
